name: Escape The Mind
description: Escape The Mind is an interactive online twine story about a character (who is played by the user) that is trying to escape his/her negative thoughts running through their mind. Escape The Mind sheds light on the struggles one with severe depression may go through. Throughout the story, different paths are presented allowing the player a more customization and engagement. The story involves deep, and some graphic materials. The objective of Escape The Mind is to do what the title says - escape the mind. Essentially, the player is responsible for finding a way out of his/her suicide attempts and to find an ending where he/she does not die. The player must save her.
